nodes.text: Palkell was a male Gormak engineer living on the planet Voss during the Galactic War. Around 3640 BBY he resided inside Gorma-Koss in the Gormak Lands beyond Outpost Skyline, where he was attacked and killed by an individual affiliated with the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Engineer Palkell appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the mission "Gormak War Camps" on Voss.
